title: Hawaij vegetable soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 butternut squash - peeled, seeded and cubed', '1 potato, peeled and cubed', '1 large tomato, diced', '2 sticks celery, sliced', '2 carrots, peeled and sliced', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas, undrained', '1.2L water', '2 tablespoons hawaij', '1 tablespoon vegetable bouillon powder', 'salt and pepper to taste']
